headline: Airbnb Links Transport And World Cup Hosting To Deepen Platform Usage
summary: Airbnb (NasdaqGS:ABNB) is piloting a scheduled private car transfer service in select international cities, extending its platform beyond home and room rentals. The company has also launched a major host incentive program tied to the FIFA World Cup 2026, focused on key host cities in North America. The World Cup initiative offers substantial rewards to new hosts who list and complete eligible stays during the tournament period. For a company known primarily for short term stays, these moves...
